item.title: 中国采购阿根廷大豆增至 35 船
item.description: 在南美国家暂停征收出口税之后，中国本周加大了从阿根廷购买大豆的力度，这使得通常在每年这个时候主导大豆贸易的美国农民靠边站了。【原文：China ramped up buying of soybeans from Argentina this week after the South American country suspended export taxes, sidelining US farmers who usually dominate the trade at this point of the year.】

item.title: 外资退出印度市场放缓，保证金贷款增加
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 恒天然预计新西兰奶农将在创纪录的派息后消费
item.description: 恒天然合作社集团主席彼得-麦克布莱德（Peter McBride）表示，在创纪录的牛奶付款之后，新西兰奶农将重新开始消费，这对新西兰疲软的经济将是一个可喜的推动。【原文：New Zealand dairy farmers are set to start spending again after a record milk payment, Fonterra Cooperative Group Chair Peter McBride said, in what would be a welcome boost for the nation’s sluggish economy.】

item.title: 韩国央行警告贸易和住房债务带来稳定风险
item.description: 韩国央行警告说，美国关税、工业长期疲软和房地产市场失衡所带来的风险可能会破坏金融稳定，并强调有必要继续收紧宏观审慎政策。【原文：South Korea’s central bank warned that risks from US tariffs, prolonged industrial weakness and housing market imbalances could undermine financial stability, highlighting the need to keep macroprudential policies tight.】

item.title: First Brands 准备最快下周申请破产保护
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，陷入困境的汽车零部件供应商 First Brands 集团正准备最快于下周申请破产，并希望获得至少 10 亿美元的贷款，以便在重组的同时维持业务运营。【原文：Troubled auto-part supplier First Brands Group is preparing to file for bankruptcy as soon as next week and is looking to secure a loan of at least $1 billion to keep the business running while it reorganizes, according to people familiar with the negotiations.】

item.title: 米莱伊的作物减税政策迅速吸引 70 亿美元流入阿根廷
item.description: 在上周抛售超过 10 亿美元之后，阿根廷货币市场正因谷物采购而充斥着大量美元，这促使人们呼吁政府开始重建硬通货储备。【原文：Argentina’s currency market is being flooded with dollars from grain purchases, prompting calls for the government to start rebuilding its stock of hard-currency reserves after selling more than $1 billion last week.】

item.title: 市场关注自由港铜矿供应中断，铜价维持高位
item.description: 在自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.【原文：Copper remained near the highest in more than a year after Freeport-McMoRan Inc. declared force majeure on contracted supplies from its giant mine in Indonesia.】

item.title: 美国计划拯救阿根廷，贝森特在中城晚会上称赞米莱
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三晚在联合国大会期间于纽约举行的一个豪华晚会上赞扬了阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱，称他 "为阿根廷新的黄金时代奠定了基础"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent praised Argentine President Javier Milei Wednesday night at a posh gala in New York on the sidelines of the UN General Assembly, saying he has “laid the foundation for a new golden age in Argentina.”】

item.title: 前日本央行董事预计最早下月加息
item.description: 据一位前日本央行董事会成员称，日本央行可能最快在下个月上调基准利率，这加剧了市场对日本央行即将上调基准利率的猜测。【原文：The Bank of Japan may raise its benchmark interest rate as soon as next month, according to a former BOJ board member, backing intensifying market speculation over an impending move.】

item.title: 日元走软支持出口商买盘，日本 Topix 指数上涨
item.description: 日本 Topix 指数小幅上涨，原因是日元走软鼓励了汽车、电子和一些机械公司等出口相关股票的买盘。受日本央行加息预期的影响，银行股也走高。【原文：Japan’s Topix index rose slightly as a weaker yen encouraged buying in export-related stocks such as automobiles, electronics, and some machinery firms. Bank stocks were also higher on the back of expectations for a Bank of Japan interest-rate hike.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴的人工智能雄心使其成为中国科技股中的佼佼者
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）对人工智能计划的热情日益高涨，再次使其成为中国最热门的科技股，投资者纷纷重返这家市值 4200 亿美元的互联网巨头。【原文：Growing enthusiasm for artificial intelligence plans at Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has once again made it China’s hottest technology stock, as investors rush back into the $420 billion internet titan.】

item.title: 澳大利亚在拟议的行业规则中公布加密货币罚款规定
item.description: 根据周四公布的期待已久的立法草案，澳大利亚将对违反拟议规则的数字资产平台运营商处以高达年营业额 10% 的罚款。【原文：Australia will slap penalties of as much as 10% of annual turnover on digital asset platform operators that breach proposed rules, under long-awaited draft legislation released Thursday.】

item.title: 美国数据为降息前景蒙上阴影，黄金涨势停滞在历史记录附近
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了积极的美国经济数据和本周美联储官员的不同观点，减息前景变得扑朔迷离，黄金维持跌势，但仍接近历史高点。【原文：Gold held a decline — but remained near an all-time high — as traders weighed positive US economic data and divergent views by Federal Reserve officials this week that clouded the path for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 稀土供应链必须包括中国，磁铁公司首席执行官说
item.description: 西方主要关键材料制造商尼欧高性能材料公司（Neo Performance Materials Inc.【原文：China should remain an important link in the global supply chain for rare-earth products given its technical expertise and competitiveness, according to Neo Performance Materials Inc., a major western maker of critical materials.】

item.title: 澳大利亚传唤新加坡电信，致命停机事故的处罚迫在眉睫
item.description: 澳大利亚通信部长阿尼卡-韦尔斯（Anika Wells）在新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）Optus 分部发生致命故障后召见了该公司，警告称这一失误可能导致重大经济处罚。【原文：Australian Communications Minister Anika Wells summoned Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. to a meeting following a fatal outage at its Optus division, warning the blunder was likely to lead to major financial penalties.】

item.title: 日本顶级基金看好估值改善的中小盘股
item.description: 由投资公司 Asset Management One Co.运营的一家业绩最佳的日本基金表示，随着估值变得更有吸引力，该公司正寻求在一些中小型企业中建立股份。【原文：A top performing Japanese fund run by investment firm Asset Management One Co. says its looking to build stakes in some small and mid-caps as valuations become more appealing.】

item.title: 美元走软可能导致亚洲新兴市场对冲需求增加
item.description: 在亚洲，保护美元风险敞口的成本是 4 月份以来最低的，并有望进一步下降，这为需要套期保值的投资者创造了机会。【原文：The cost of protecting dollar exposures in Asia is the lowest since April and poised to decline further, creating an opportunity for investors who need to hedge.】

item.title: 世界第二大铜矿事故引发市场疲软
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.【原文：Freeport-McMoRan Inc.’s declaration of force majeure at its Grasberg mine in Indonesia — where two employees are dead and five missing after a massive mud flow — couldn’t have come at a worse time for the global copper market.】

item.title: 中国债券供应将在年底前减少，缓解市场压力
item.description: 中国政府债券的发行量将在年底前大幅下降，这将缓解市场因股票轮动而承受的压力。【原文：Chinese government bond issuance is set to plunge by year-end, offering relief to a market also pressured by a rotation into equities.】

item.title: 石油因特朗普鹰派通俄言论而跳涨后趋于平稳
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对俄罗斯的鹰派言论愈演愈烈，引发地缘政治风险之后，石油价格在创下 7 月份以来最大涨幅之后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied following its biggest jump since July, after US President Donald Trump’s increasingly hawkish rhetoric on Russia raised geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 汇丰称通过新量子试验击败华尔街竞争对手
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）表示，该公司在金融市场部署量子计算方面取得了世界首例突破，华尔街一些最大的公司正在加紧争夺将这项尖端技术嵌入其日常运营中。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc said it’s achieved a world-first breakthrough in deploying quantum computing in financial markets, as a race intensifies among some of Wall Street’s biggest firms to embed the cutting-edge technology in their daily operations.】

item.title: 爱尔兰政府就支出增加发出新警告
item.description: 爱尔兰经济与社会研究所（Economic and Social Research Institute）表示，由于政府支出和住房投资的增加，爱尔兰经济的增长速度将超过此前的预期，同时该研究所还对潜在的经济过热提出了警告。【原文：Ireland’s economy is set to grow more than previously expected on rising government spending and housing investment, the Economic and Social Research Institute said, as it warned about potential overheating.】

item.title: 中国最大的汽车出口商奇瑞汽车将在香港首次亮相
item.description: 中国最大的汽车出口商奇瑞汽车股份有限公司（Chery Automobile Co.【原文：Chery Automobile Co., China’s biggest car exporter, will start trading in Hong Kong Thursday after raising HK$9.1 billion ($1.2 billion) in an initial public offering to help power its overseas expansion ambition.】

item.title: 特朗普在乌克兰问题上的新转变让欧洲感到束手无策
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普对基辅抗击俄罗斯入侵战争的前景持乐观态度，乌克兰及其盟国正沉浸在特朗普的惊喜之中，有迹象表明美国总统正在采取一个熟悉的举动：不是对俄罗斯，而是对欧洲施加更大的压力。【原文：As Ukraine and its allies absorbed the surprise from Donald Trump’s newly upbeat view of Kyiv’s prospects in its war against Russia’s invasion, there were signs of a familiar move by the US president — upping the pressure not on Russia but on Europe.】

item.title: 加拿大与印尼在美国关税动荡中签署贸易协议
item.description: 印度尼西亚和加拿大同意达成一项降低贸易壁垒和放宽投资程序的协议，这是两国在美国提高关税之后为扩大全球经济联系所做努力的一部分。【原文：Indonesia and Canada agreed to a deal to lower trade barriers and ease investment procedures, part of efforts by both nations to expand global economic ties in the wake of higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 全球涨势停滞，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 随着人工智能推动的股市上涨逐渐出现疲态，亚洲股市周四将追随华尔街的跌势而下滑。【原文：Asian stocks were set to slip Thursday, tracking losses on Wall Street as signs of fatigue crept into the AI-fueled equity rally.】

item.title: 凯雷投资的 Orion 啤酒公司将在东京证券交易所上市
item.description: Orion Breweries Ltd. 首次公开募股规模扩大后，将于本周四在东京证券交易所上市交易。【原文：Orion Breweries Ltd. is set to trade on the Tokyo Stock Exchange on Thursday after the size of its initial public offering was increased.】

item.title: 叙利亚领导人在联合国呼吁国际社会帮助重建四分五裂的国家
item.description: 叙利亚总统首次登上国际舞台，这是半个多世纪以来叙利亚领导人首次在联合国大会上发表讲话。【原文：Syria’s president made his debut on the international stage with the first address by a leader from his country to the United Nations General Assembly in more than half a century.】

item.title: 美国生命线颠覆空头押注，贝森特止损阿根廷危机
item.description: 投机者试图从阿根廷市场的大跌中获利，却被一个愿意站在交易对立面的强大投资者--美国政府--拦住了去路。【原文：Speculators seeking to profit from the selloffs racing through Argentina’s markets were stopped dead in their tracks by a powerful investor willing to take the opposite side of the trade: The US government.】
